testcase.classname: As a user, I want to be able to register, view, update and delete addresses in my profile via API connection.
testcase.name: When a PATCH request body containing valid authorization information and required data is sent to the /api/profile/customerAddressUpdate/(x) endpoint, it should be verified that the status code returned is 202 and the message information in the response body is "address updated successfully".
testcase.system-out: * Api kullanicisi "api,profile,customerAddressUpdate,384" path parametreleri set eder.passed * Api kullanicisi customerAddressUpdate PATCH yapmak icin valid body hazirlar.passed * Api kullanicisi PATCH yaparak response kaydeder...........................passed * Api user tests that returned status code after PATCH process is 202.......passed * Api user tests that after PATCH process message informatin in response bosy is "address updated successfully".passed
